tika-s0402t13:1_1: Catutthassa paṭhame āmisassa ca dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa ca antare sambhavantassa chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa santharaṇaṁ pidahanaṁ saṅgaṇhanaṁ santhāro.
tika-s0402t13:1_2: Ayañhi lokasannivāso alabbhamānena āmisena dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo.
tika-s0402t13:1_3: Tassa taṁ chiddaṁ yathā na paññāyati ,
tika-s0402t13:1_4: evaṁ pīṭhassa viya paccattharaṇena āmisena dhammena ca santharaṇaṁ saṅgaṇhanaṁ santhāroti vuccati.
tika-s0402t13:1_5: Ettha ca āmisena saṅgaho āmisasanthāro nāma.
tika-s0402t13:1_6: Taṁ karontena mātāpitūnaṁ bhikkhugatikassa veyyāvaccakarassa rañño corānañca aggaṁ aggahetvāpi dātuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0402t13:1_7: Āmasitvā dinnehi rājāno ca corā ca anatthampi karonti, jīvitakkhayampi pāpenti.
tika-s0402t13:1_11: Sakkaccaṁ uddesadānaṁ pāḷivaṇṇanā dhammakathākathananti evaṁ dhammena saṅgaho dhammasanthāro nāma.
